subclassFeature.name: Oath of the Unconquered
entries: Unconquered Paladin's are soldiers who dedicate themselves to defending the ideals of freedom, prosperity and fighting those would use strength and violence to subdue and rule the weak. Commonly called Bulwark Knights, and The Unbroken, these soldiers stride into battle with defencive magics alight, making them mobile fortresses that can withstand the wroth of kings, emperors and gods.

entries.name: Defend the Weak.
entries: When walls and shields are not enough you must be there to be their bulwark against destruction.

entries.name: Challenge the Strong.
entries: You are unbreakable. Show no fear, and take little caution. The tyrants are your nemesis, and you theirs.

entries.name: Kindle Courage
entries: When there is doubt, you must be ann anchor for the courage and will of those around you.

subclassFeature.name: Oath Spells
entries: You gain oath spells at the paladin levels listed.

entries.caption: Oath of the Unconquered Spells
rows: {@spell Otiluke's resilient sphere}, {@spell freedom of movement}

subclassFeature.name: Channel Divinity: Adamantine Bulwark
entries: Anytime you take damage from an attack or spell, you can use your reaction and your channel divinty to reduce all damage you take by an amount equal to three times your paladin level.

subclassFeature.name: Channel Divinity: Unstoppable Charge
entries: As an action, you can use your Channel Divinity to move up to your speed in a straight line. You can move through enemy creatures and the first enemy creature that is up to one size larger than you that you come into contact with must succeed on a strength saving throw or take bludgeoning damage equal to 2 d8 + your paladin level, and be forcibly moved along with you until you finish your movement.Each other creature whose space you, or the creature you 're pushing, pass through must succeed on a dexterity saving throw or be knocked prone.

subclassFeature.name: Aura of Iron
entries: Starting at 7th level, you emanate so many protective magics that it is almost palpable. You and friendly creatures within 10 feet of you reduce all damage taken by an amount equal to your charisma modifier (minimum 1) You reduce damage this way before resistances have been calculated.
At 18th level, the range of this aura increases to 30 feet.

subclassFeature.name: Living Fortress
entries: At 15th level, you have come to embody  many qualities of an actual fortress. You can no longer be forcibly moved by spell effects, or by abilities used by creatures up to one size larger than you. Additionally, allies who are within 5 feet of you, and are of your size or smaller, gain the benefits of half cover.

subclassFeature.name: Unbreakable Defender
entries: At 20th level, you can use an action to create an additional layer of armor made of solidified radiant energy that appears over your form. For one minute you gain the following benefits:

items: If an attack or spell that deals damage would damage you for 15 hit points or less, you ignore it.
Anytime a hostile creature that makes a ranged attack against an allied creature within your Aura of Iron, you can roll a d6, on a 4 or higher you become the target of the attack instead.
Allied creatures within 30ft of you always gain the benefits of half cover.

entries: Once you use this feature, you can't use it again until you finish a long rest.
